name: griptape (griptape-ai)
description: [项目级] Modular Python framework for AI agents and workflows with chain-of-thought reasoning, tools, and memory. 。来源: https://github.com/griptape-ai/griptape

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Modular Python framework for AI agents and workflows with chain-of-thought reasoning, tools, and memory. 

来源: https://github.com/griptape-ai/griptape
语言: Python
Stars: 2478

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
from griptape.drivers.prompt.openai import OpenAiChatPromptDriver
from griptape.rules import Rule
from griptape.tasks import PromptTask

task = PromptTask(
    prompt_driver=OpenAiChatPromptDriver(model="gpt-4.1"),
    rules=[Rule("Keep your answer to a few sentences.")],
)

result = task.run("How do I do a kickflip?")

print(result.value)
